replies.text: Hi. I'm To Do bot. I can help you manage your To Do list in your OneNote.
replies.speak: Hi. I'm To Do bot. I can help you manage your To Do list in your OneNote.

suggestedActions: Create a todo task for me
Mark the second To Do task as complete

replies.text: I can read out your To Do's, create a new To Do, or complete and delete a To Do for you.
replies.speak: I can read out your To Do's, create a new To Do, or complete and delete a To Do for you.

suggestedActions: Create a todo task for me
